## Q5

### Q6
```{r}
grades |>
  filter(course == "Herbalism and Medicine")|>
  group_by(group) |>
  summarize(avg_grade = mean(grade,na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = group, y = avg_grade)) +
  geom_col()+
  ylim(0,20)
  
```

# Q7
